abstract: Donald Trump, in Scotland to check in on his luxury Turnberry resort and golf course, calls Great Britain's vote to leave European Union 'a great thing'; draws connection between sentiments driving 'Brexit' vote and those fueling his own rise, and predicts vote will benefit his golf course.
lead_paragraph: Touching down in Scotland to visit his luxury resort and golf course, Mr. Trump took a victory lap of sorts after Britain voted to leave the European Union.

headline.main: Donald Trump, in Scotland, Calls ‘Brexit’ Result ‘a Great Thing’
headline.print_headline: Trump, Visiting His Scottish Golf Courses, Praises the Result as Good for Business

snippet: Touching down in Scotland to visit his luxury resort and golf course, Mr. Trump took a victory lap of sorts after Britain voted to leave the European Union.
